attributes.action: Knight Captain Tom Moore for services to his country & fundraising for NHS
attributes.additional_details:
At the age of 99 Captain Tom Moore has dedicated his days up to his 100th birthday to raise money for NHS charities during a global pandemic. 

He has already served his country during WW2 & still thinks of others at this grave time.
attributes.background: Give Captain Tom Moore a knighthood.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
